title: Poster, Exhibition Poster: Walter De Maria, 50 M ³ (1600 cubic feet) Level Dirt , Galerie Heiner Friedrich, Munich, 1968
title_raw: Exhibition Poster: Walter De Maria, 50 M ³ (1600 cubic feet) Level Dirt , Galerie Heiner Friedrich, Munich
inscribed:
Imprinted at right side, center: WALTER DE MARIA/ 50 M 3 (1600 CUBIC FEET) LEVEL DIRT/GALERIE HEINER FRIEDRICH MUNCHEN/MAXIMILIANSTRASSE 15/ TELEFON 295021/ 28.SEPTEMBER - 10.OCTOBER 1968

Imprinted in caps at left side, center:  PURE DIRT - PURE EARTH - PURE LAND/ NO OBJECT ON IT/ NO OBJECT IN IT/ NO MARKINGS ON IT/NO MARKINGS IN IT/ NOTHING GROWING ON IT/NOTHING GROWING IN IT
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Artist's exhibition poster: top half of image shows a building elevation (with four windows) and plan (of three rooms and hallway); bottom half of image shows photographic portrait of artist with road in background.  Text at left of center; artist's name and gallery name at right of center.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, Exhibition Poster: Walter De Maria, 50 M ³ (1600 cubic feet) Level Dirt , Galerie Heiner Friedrich, Munich, 1968. offset lithography. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1999-45-11.
